content: jawbreaker candy jawbreaker candy is a lovely triangle shawl that is knit sideways with a yarn madelinetosh asap curve to it needle 17 us 12 75 mm or what you need to get gauge gauge 7 0 stitches = 4 inches this can easily be adjusted to any weight and amount of yarn yardage 180 yards size 80 x 32 adjustable this is named after jawbreakers candy better known as gobstoppers page 1 cast on 2 stitches row 1 rs kfb knit 1 3 stitches row 2 ws kfb kfb knit 1 5 stitches row 3 rs kfb knit to the last 2 stitches k2tog row 4 ws knit 2 purl to the last 2 stitches pfb knit 1 work row 3 and 4 6 times total 11 stitches row 5 rs kfb knit to the last 2 stitches k2tog row 6 ws knit 2 purl to the last 2 stitches pfb knit 1 work row 5 and 6 3 times total row 7 rs kfb knit 1 yo k2tog repeat to the last 2 stitches k2tog row 8 ws knit 2 purl to the last 2 stitches pfb knit 1 work the directions in the box to desired size work row 5 and 6 2 times total row 9 rs kfb knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 2 stitches k2tog row 10 ws knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 3 stitches knit 1 pfb purl 1 row 11 rs bind off row bind off in pattern purl 1 knit 1 be sure to keep it loose finishing weave in ends block and enjoy k2tog knit 2 stitches together pfb purl in the front and back of the same stitch yo yarn over kfb knit in the front and back of the same stitch ws wrong side rs right side taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2021 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2
